name: flipaq
description: For users to be able to create and study flashcards

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Gregory Krolick, Gina Lguerrero, Jie Zou
